body: Love this shit! If only the old dude was crushed by the giantess. I wouda came at least thirce more. Also, I don’t understand why the giantess didn’t have dicks. Did the aritst forget to draw them...? Anyways, I will definetly be reading more of Tatsumi-sensei’s work!
